bibl.title: Danaus βουγενής: Greco-Egyptian Mythology and Ptolemaic Kingship.
bibl.note: Callimachus, Aetia, fr. 54 Harder = fr. 383 Pf. - Philetas' bees and Callimachus' Argos. - Danaus βουγενής between Epaphus and Dionysus. - Danaus and the Ptolemaic cult of Apis. - βουγενής as marker of royalty and divinity. - Empedoclean echoes and Ptolemaic past. - Callimachean cosmogonies and the Victoria Berenices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Alexandros Kampakoglou, Danaus βουγενής: Greco-Egyptian Mythology and Ptolemaic Kingship.

Callimachus, Aetia, fr. 54 Harder = fr. 383 Pf. - Philetas' bees and Callimachus' Argos. - Danaus βουγενής between Epaphus and Dionysus. - Danaus and the Ptolemaic cult of Apis. - βουγενής as marker of royalty and divinity. - Empedoclean echoes and Ptolemaic past. - Callimachean cosmogonies and the Victoria Berenices. - Avec résumé en anglais.
